org.activebpel.wsio.receive
Class AeMessageContext

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.wsio.receive.AeMessageContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeMessageContext, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeExtendedMessageContext
public class AeMessageContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeMessageContext

Provides a context for an incoming message to the bpel engine.

See Also:

getEmbeddedEndpointReference

public IAeWebServiceEndpointReference getEmbeddedEndpointReference()
Deprecated. Replaced with getPartnerEndpointReference() method.

Description copied from interface: IAeMessageContext
Gets the embedded endpoint reference that should be used for any asynchronous replies on this partner link. This is an optional value and is only used if the endpoint reference source for the partner link is declared as "invoker" in the PDD.

Specified by:
getEmbeddedEndpointReference in interface IAeMessageContext
See Also:
IAeMessageContext.getEmbeddedEndpointReference()

getProcessVersion

public java.lang.String getProcessVersion()
Description copied from interface: IAeMessageContext
Gets the version of the process that the message is targeting. A null or empty string indicates that the message should be routed to the current version of the process.

Specified by:
getProcessVersion in interface IAeMessageContext
